com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.spring

Class SpringAwareRuleBookRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.Auditor
      • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner.AbstractRuleBookRunner
        • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.runner.RuleBookRunner
          • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.spring.SpringAwareRuleBookRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuleBook, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    public class SpringAwareRuleBookRunner
extends RuleBookRunner
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Runs the POJO Rules that can be Spring aware beans in a specified package as a RuleBook.

    POJO rule classes in the package may or may not have the @Component/@Service/etc. annotation. If they do, the bean will be fetched and @Autowired variables will be populated. If not, an instance of the POJO rule will be created and used.

      • getRuleInstance

        protected java.lang.Object getRuleInstance(java.lang.Class<?> rule)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRuleBookRunner
        Returns a rule instance

        For container aware contexts (like Spring, Guice, Weld, etc.) override this method and instantiate the rule via the container.
